API docs by Redocly

SAF Auth API (1.0.0)

Download OpenAPI specification:

Authentication API for SAF

auth

Register New User

Request Body schema: application/json
required
email
required
string <email>
password
required
string >= 8 characters
name
string

User's full name (optional)

givenName
string

User's given name (optional)

familyName
string

User's family name (optional)

Responses

/auth/register

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "password": "stringst",
  • "name": "string",
  • "givenName": "string",
  • "familyName": "string"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 409
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": 0,
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "emailVerified": true,
  • "name": "string",
  • "givenName": "string",
  • "familyName": "string",
  • "scopes": [
    • "string"
    ]
}

Verify Authentication Status

Used by Caddy for forward authentication. Verifies if the user is authenticated and adds user information headers for downstream services.

Responses

/auth/verify

Response samples

  • 200
  • 401
  • 403
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": 0,
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "emailVerified": true,
  • "name": "string",
  • "givenName": "string",
  • "familyName": "string",
  • "scopes": [
    • "string"
    ]
}

Request Body schema: application/json
required
email
required
string <email>

Responses

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "email": "user@example.com"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
Content type
application/json
{
  • "success": true,
  • "message": "string"
}

Reset Password Using Token

Request Body schema: application/json
required
token
required
string

The temporary password token received via email

newPassword
required
string >= 8 characters

The new password to set

Responses

/auth/reset-password

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "token": "string",
  • "newPassword": "stringst"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
Content type
application/json
{
  • "success": true
}

Change User Password

Request Body schema: application/json
required
currentPassword
required
string

The user's current password for verification

newPassword
required
string >= 8 characters

The new password to set

Responses

/auth/set-password

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "currentPassword": "string",
  • "newPassword": "stringst"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 401
Content type
application/json
{
  • "success": true
}

Get User Profile

Get the profile information for the currently logged in user

Responses

/auth/profile

Response samples

  • 200
  • 401
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": 0,
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "emailVerified": true,
  • "name": "string",
  • "givenName": "string",
  • "familyName": "string"
}

Update User Profile

Update the profile information for the currently logged in user

Request Body schema: application/json
required
email
string <email>

User's email address

emailVerified
boolean

Whether the user's email address has been verified

name
string or null

User's full name

givenName
string or null

User's given name (first name)

familyName
string or null

User's family name (last name)

Responses

/auth/profile

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "emailVerified": true,
  • "name": "string",
  • "givenName": "string",
  • "familyName": "string"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 409
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": 0,
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "emailVerified": true,
  • "name": "string",
  • "givenName": "string",
  • "familyName": "string"
}

Authorizations:
scopes

Responses

/users

Response samples

  • 401
  • 403
Content type
application/json
[
  • {
    • "id": 0,
    • "email": "user@example.com",
    • "createdAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    • "lastLoginAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    • "verifiedAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    • "permissions": [
      • "string"
      ]
    }
]

email

  • 403
Content type
application/json
[
  • {
    • "to": [
      • "string"
      ],
    • "cc": [
      • "string"
      ],
    • "bcc": [
      • "string"
      ],
    • "subject": "string",
    • "text": "string",
    • "html": "string",
    • "attachments": [
      • "string"
      ],
    • "from": "string",
    • "timeSent": 0
    }
]
